summary.span: Represents derived classes known to be management instrumentation instance classes.

summary.span: These derived classes inherit an implementation of that allows instances to be published through the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在派生的类构造函数来初始化此类型中的状态将调用此构造函数。This constructor is called by derived class constructors to initialize state in this type. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

summary.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether instances of classes that implement this interface are visible through management instrumentation.

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether instances of classes that implement this interface are visible through management instrumentation.

value.span: 返回值，该值指示实现此接口的类的实例通过管理检测可见。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether instances of classes that implement this interface are visible through management instrumentation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 属性值Property Value `true`如果实例是通过管理检测; 可见否则为 `false``true`, if the instance is visible through management instrumentation; otherwise, `false` ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
